creator: umoghe@bol.net.in
text:
Hi,

I am getting the error given below after starting Tomcat. The application works 
fine but after some time the sessions are lost.

Pl look into this maatter
java.io.EOFException
        at java.io.ObjectInputStream$PeekInputStream.readFully(ObjectInputStream
.java:2165)
        at java.io.ObjectInputStream$BlockDataInputStream.readShort(ObjectInputS
tream.java:2634)
        at java.io.ObjectInputStream.readStreamHeader(ObjectInputStream.java:734
)
        at java.io.ObjectInputStream.<init>(ObjectInputStream.java:253)
        at org.apache.catalina.util.CustomObjectInputStream.<init>(CustomObjectI
nputStream.java:103)
        at org.apache.catalina.session.FileStore.load(FileStore.java:296)
        at org.apache.catalina.session.StoreBase.processExpires(StoreBase.java:2
95)
        at org.apache.catalina.session.StoreBase.run(StoreBase.java:350)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:536)

regards Umesh

creator: funkman@joedog.org
text:
Tomcat 4.0 is no longer under support for this type of error. 

Please use the tomcat-user list to debug this problem (most likely a
configuration or JVM/OS related issue since its win9x) even if this is with a
different version of tomcat.
